Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • RegularPolygon

  • public class RegularPolygon
extends java.lang.Object
    The RegularPolygon class creates an n sided regular polygon which all sides have the same length and all angles have the same degree.
    Version:
    9/25/2017
    Author:
    Kemar Golding & Erik Zagarello

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Constructor that creates a regular polygon with default values.
      RegularPolygon(int n, double side)
      Constructor that creates a regular polygon with the spcified number of sides and length of side, centered at (0, 0).
      RegularPolygon(int n, double side, double x, double y)
      Constructor that creates a regular polygon with the specified number of sides, length of side, and x- and y-coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getArea()
      Returns the Area of the method
      double getLength()
      Accessor method that returns the length of each side of the polygon.
      double getPerimeter()
      Returns the perimeter of the method
      int getSides()
      Accessor method that returns the number of sides of the polygon.
      double getXCoord()
      Accessor method that returns the x-coord of the polygon's center.
      double getYCoord()
      Accessor method that returns the y-coord of the polygon's center.
      void printArea_Perimeter()
      Print method for RegularPolygon state.
      void setLength(double side)
      Mutator method that assigns the side variable a new double.
      void setSides(int n)
      Mutator method that assigns the n variable a new integer.
      void setXCoord(double x)
      Mutator method that assigns the x variable a new double.
      void setYCoord(double y)
      Mutator method that assigns the x variable a new double.

      • setLength

        public void setLength(double side)
        Mutator method that assigns the side variable a new double. Gives the polygon the new length of each side.

      • setSides

        public void setSides(int n)
        Mutator method that assigns the n variable a new integer. Gives the polygon a new number of sides.

      • setXCoord

        public void setXCoord(double x)
        Mutator method that assigns the x variable a new double. Gives the polygon a new x-coordinate for its center.

        Mutator method that assigns the x variable a new double. Gives the polygon a new x-coordinate for its center.
